verses.roman:
nija-vastre kaila prabhu gṛha sammārjana
mahāprabhu nija-vastre mājila siṁhāsana

synonyms: nija-vastre—by His own garment; kaila—did; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; gṛha—room; sammārjana—mopping; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; nija-vastre—by His own garment; mājila—polished; siṁhāsana—throne.
translation: The Lord mopped the rooms with His own clothes, and He polished the throne with them also.
